summary: REQ-6 and REQ-7 are not fully satisfied by the shown diff. The diff only shows a Footer change (including a hardcoded logo asset path) and does not show the required static asset replacement in frontend/public/assets/generated nor the Discord link update across the site. The Footer also adds new caffeine.ai attribution/UTM behavior that was not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Replace the current static images used for the site logo and the hero/banner background with the user-uploaded image(s) by placing the uploaded artwork into the existing asset paths and filenames already referenced by the UI (so no code changes are required for the swap).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not show any changes under frontend/public/assets/generated (where the images must be served from) and does not show any hero/banner background image swap. Only a Footer component change is shown, which is insufficient to verify the required asset replacement and hero background rendering.
evidence: frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx (only code change shown; no public asset changes present in diff summary)

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the Discord link used across the site is set to https://discord.gg/coopersmp and that the Contact sectionâ€™s Discord button links to it (opens in a new tab), with no other Discord placeholder URLs remaining.
missing_requirements.reason: No changes are shown to site configuration or the Contact section (or any other component) that would set/update the Discord URL to https://discord.gg/coopersmp or ensure the Contact Discord button uses it.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (ContactSection.tsx exists but no diff provided for it)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/siteConfig.ts exists but no diff provided for it)

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed footer attribution and outbound caffeine.ai link with dynamic UTM parameters based on window.location.hostname.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asked to swap logo/hero images and confirm/update the Discord link; it did not request adding new attribution links or UTM tracking logic.
evidence: frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx (caffeineUrl with UTM params; caffeine.ai link added/used)
